   <h3 class="category"><a name="cat:Application Server">Application Server</a></h3>
   <ul class="packages">

   <h3 class="category"><a name="cat:Benchmarking">Benchmarking</a></h3>
   <ul class="packages">
    <li><a href="/package/BenchmarkHistory">BenchmarkHistory</a> library and program: Benchmark functions with history</li>
    <li><a href="/package/cloben">cloben</a> program: Clone and benchmark Haskell cabal projects</li>
    <li><a href="/package/containers-benchmark">containers-benchmark</a> program: Extensive benchmark suite for containers package.</li>
    <li><a href="/package/criterion">criterion</a> library, program and tests: Robust, reliable performance measurement and analysis</li>
    <li><a href="/package/criterion-plus">criterion-plus</a> library and test: Enhancement of the "criterion" benchmarking library</li>
    <li><a href="/package/feed-gipeda">feed-gipeda</a> library, program and test: CI service around gipeda</li>
    <li><a href="/package/fibon">fibon</a> programs: Tools for running and analyzing Haskell benchmarks</li>
    <li><a href="/package/gauge">gauge</a> library and tests: small framework for performance measurement and analysis</li>
    <li><a href="/package/hashtable-benchmark">hashtable-benchmark</a> program: Benchmark of hash table implementations</li>
    <li><a href="/package/hyperion">hyperion</a> library, programs and test: Reliable performance measurement with robust data export.</li>
   </ul>

   <h3 class="category"><a name="cat:Categories">Categories</a></h3>
   <ul class="packages">
    <li><a href="/package/groupoids">groupoids</a> library: This package has been absorbed into semigroupoids 4.0</li>
    <li><a href="/package/hyperfunctions">hyperfunctions</a> library: Hyperfunctions</li>
    <li><a href="/package/profunctor-extras">profunctor-extras</a> library: This package has been absorbed into profunctors 4.0</li>
    <li><a href="/package/profunctors">profunctors</a> library: Profunctors</li>
    <li><a href="/package/representable-profunctors">representable-profunctors</a> library: This package has been absorbed into profunctor-extras.</li>
    <li><a href="/package/subhask">subhask</a> library, tests and benchmark: Type safe interface for programming in subcategories of Hask</li>
    <li><a href="/package/thrist">thrist</a> library: Type-threaded list</li>
   </ul>

    <li><a href="/package/ppm">ppm</a> library: a tiny PPM image generator</li>

    <li><a href="/package/rot13">rot13</a> library and test: Fast ROT13 cipher for Haskell.</li>

    <li><a href="/package/transformers-compose">transformers-compose</a> library: Arrow-like / category-like composition for transformers.</li>
    <li><a href="/package/transformers-continue">transformers-continue</a> library: Control flow data type and monad transformer.</li>

    <li><a href="/package/Workflow">Workflow</a> library: Workflow patterns over a monad for thread state logging &amp; recovery</li>

    <li><a href="/package/HLearn-datastructures">HLearn-datastructures</a> library</li>

    <li><a href="/package/libgraph">libgraph</a> library: Store and manipulate data in a graph.</li>

   <h3 class="category"><a name="cat:Documentation">Documentation</a></h3>
   <ul class="packages">
    <li><a href="/package/acme-operators">acme-operators</a> library: Operators of base, all in one place!</li>
    <li><a href="/package/activehs">activehs</a> program: Haskell code presentation tool</li>
    <li><a href="/package/activehs-base">activehs-base</a> library: Basic definitions for activehs</li>
    <li><a href="/package/archiver">archiver</a> library and program: Archive supplied URLs in WebCite &amp; Internet Archive</li>
    <li><a href="/package/dash-haskell">dash-haskell</a> program: Convert package Haddock to Dash docsets (IDE docs)</li>
    <li><a href="/package/doccheck">doccheck</a> program: Checks Haddock comments for pitfalls and version changes.</li>
    <li><a href="/package/docidx">docidx</a> program: Generate an HTML index of installed Haskell packages and their documentation.</li>
    <li><a href="/package/Docs">Docs</a> library: Documentation types library.</li>

   <h3 class="category"><a name="cat:GHC">GHC</a></h3>
   <ul class="packages">
    <li><a href="/package/box-tuples">box-tuples</a> library: A hack to use GHC.Prim primitives in GHCi</li>
    <li><a href="/package/CoreDump">CoreDump</a> library: A GHC plugin for printing GHC's internal Core data structures.</li>
    <li><a href="/package/error-analyze">error-analyze</a> library and test: Parse ghc and cabal error messages and give their causes for easier resolution</li>
    <li><a href="/package/ghc-boot">ghc-boot</a> library: Shared functionality between GHC and its boot libraries</li>
    <li><a href="/package/ghc-boot-th">ghc-boot-th</a> library: Shared functionality between GHC and the @template-haskell@ library</li>
    <li><a href="/package/ghc-datasize">ghc-datasize</a> library: Determine the size of data structures in GHC's memory</li>
    <li><a href="/package/ghc-dup">ghc-dup</a> library: Explicitly prevent sharing</li>
    <li><a href="/package/ghc-events">ghc-events</a> library, program and tests: Library and tool for parsing .eventlog files from GHC</li>
    <li><a href="/package/ghc-events-parallel">ghc-events-parallel</a> library, program and test: Library and tool for parsing .eventlog files from parallel GHC</li>
    <li><a href="/package/ghc-heap-view">ghc-heap-view</a> library and test: Extract the heap representation of Haskell values and thunks</li>
    <li><a href="/package/ghc-man-completion">ghc-man-completion</a> program: Generate a bash completion from the GHC manpage</li>
    <li><a href="/package/ghc-mod">ghc-mod</a> library, programs, tests and benchmark: Happy Haskell Hacking</li>
    <li><a href="/package/ghc-prim">ghc-prim</a> library: GHC primitives</li>
    <li><a href="/package/ghc-vis">ghc-vis</a> library: Live visualization of data structures in GHCi</li>
    <li><a href="/package/ghci">ghci</a> library: The library supporting GHC's interactive interpreter</li>
    <li><a href="/package/ghci-history-parser">ghci-history-parser</a> library and tests: parse output of ghci ":history" command</li>
    <li><a href="/package/hackager">hackager</a> program: Hackage testing tool</li>
    <li><a href="/package/isevaluated">isevaluated</a> library: Check whether a value has been evaluated</li>
    <li><a href="/package/linux-perf">linux-perf</a> library and programs: Read files generated by perf on Linux</li>
    <li><a href="/package/packman">packman</a> library and tests: Serialization library for GHC</li>
    <li><a href="/package/vacuum">vacuum</a> library: Graph representation of the GHC heap</li>
    <li><a href="/package/vacuum-graphviz">vacuum-graphviz</a> library: A library for transforming vacuum graphs into GraphViz output</li>
   </ul>

    <li><a href="/package/json-rpc-server">json-rpc-server</a> library, program and test: JSON-RPC 2.0 on the server side.</li>
